entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 10 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
